alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca; South Cass; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 28 at 2:32AM CDT until May 28 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EXPECTED THIS AFTERNOON AND SUNDAY AFTERNOON... Dry conditions are forecast this afternoon along with gusty winds. In these conditions, fires may start or spread quickly. Dry and breezy conditions are expected to develop again Sunday afternoon and early evening as well, which may lead to critical fire weather conditions. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMDITY FOR NORTH CENTRAL MINNESOTA... The National Weather Service in Duluth has issued a Red Flag Warning for low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon today to 9 PM CDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...In Minnesota, Koochiching, North Itasca, North Cass, South Itasca and South Cass. * WINDS...South 10 to 15 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 16 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the upper 70s. * IMPACTS...Any fires may grow and spread quickly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca; South Cass; South Itasca
